text: @WhiteHouse @FLOTUS @NIH Maybe if her husband could do his job instead of downplaying the pandemic for MONTHS this wouldn't be necessary. Workers need PPE, we need mass covid-19 TESTING, need people to stay HOME and only go out when NECESSARY and WEARING MASKS. @FLOTUS PLEASE EDUCATE the MORON-IN-CHIEF
